sn35.64:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.64:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā migajālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.64:4.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.64:5.1: “Santi kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.64:5.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.64:5.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.64:5.5: santi ca kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā … pe …
sn35.64:5.6: santi ca kho, migajāla, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.64:5.7: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.64:5.8: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.64:6.1: Santi ca kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.64:6.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.64:6.3: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35.64:6.5: santi ca kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā iṭṭhā kantā … pe …
sn35.64:6.6: santi ca kho, migajāla, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.64:6.7: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.64:6.8: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35.64:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn35.64:7.2: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharato nacirasseva—
sn35.64:7.3: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
sn35.64:7.4: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn35.64:7.5: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn35.64:7.6: Aññataro ca panāyasmā migajālo arahataṃ ahosīti.
